subject: Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: In a week with ominous warnings about potential drug suspensions, there were still several players, like the Dodgers’ Yasiel Puig, that remind fans why they care in the first place.
snippet: In a week with ominous warnings about potential drug suspensions, there were still several players, like the Dodgers’ Yasiel Puig, that remind fans why they care in the first place.
